Welcome to Philips Hue Color Adaptive Sunlight’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class colorChange.ColorTemperatureChange¶

This class process the correct color temperatur information

determineHueStates()¶

get the current time and determine whether the philips hue is in hi or low states

Return type:str
Returns:hi/low
getColorTemperature(mode)¶

get the correct control value that is to be sent to the Philips hue

Parameters:mode (str) – can be either hi/low
Return type:int
Returns:the control value that is to be sent to philips hue
setHueMode()¶
class colorChange.LastUpdate¶

This class stores the last updated sunrise and sunset information. The data is only get updated once a day at midnight.

getLastUpdate()¶

Get the last updated sun information

Return type:(int, int, int, int)
Returns:(sunrise_h, sunrise_m, sunset_h, sunset_m)
getLastUpdateDate()¶
Return type:datetime.date
Returns:get last updated date
updateLastUpdate(date, sunrise_h, sunrise_m, sunset_h, sunset_m)¶

update sunrise and sunset

Parameters:
  • date (datetime.date) – current date
  • sunrise_h (int) – sunrise hour
  • sunrise_m (int) – sunrise minute
  • sunset_h (int) – sunset hour
  • sunset_m (int) – sunset minute
